caption.p: In vitro effect of oregano oil on the linear velocity (VSL). The dilution of EO was done in a 0.2% ( w/ v) sterile agar solution. The percentage of VSL of each aliquot was measured after the addition of the EO and 5 min and 10 min treatment. Oregano oil could significantly improve the VSL over a period of 5 to 10 min ( ∗∗ P < 0.01; n = 25).
